content: असिः [अस्यते क्षिप्यते; अस्-इन् <ls>Uṇ. 4. 139</ls>] {@--1@} A sword. {@--2@} A knife used for killing animals. {@--3@} [अस्यति सेवनेन पापानि] <ab>N.</ab> of a river to the south of Benares. {@--4@} Breath (श्वास). --सि {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} The 2nd <ab>pers.</ab> <ab>sing.</ab> of the Present of अस् to be, used as an indeclinable in the sense of ‘त्वम्’ thou; as in कृतवानसि विप्रियं न मे <ls>Ku. 4. 7</ls> (where however असि may be taken as a verb).
